title: Mel B apparently had a "wild fling" with this surprising X Factor contestant
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Close your eyes and imagine the most unlikely celebrity romance of all time. Go on, we've got time (and no, we don't mean Cheryl and Liam R.I.P). If Mel B, also known as Scary Spice, reality show judge and all round legend, and James Arthur, winner of the ninth series of The X Factor came to mind then congratulations! You win 100 points!

Yep, according to new reports the pair hooked up and had a "wild fling" after meeting on America's Got Talent back in 2017, where Mel was on the judging panel and James popped in to perform. An anonymous source (aren't they always?) told The Sun,"James was single at the time and they hit it off instantly. Mel thought James was very handsome and would become the next big British music superstar." The report claims the pair got together soon after Mel's marriage to Stephen Belafonte ended.

Photo credit: Alvaro Cabrera - Getty Images More

The source continued, "James couldn’t believe his luck that a stunning member of the Spice Girls would be interested in him. They had a wild fling and loved spending time together, but it ended respectfully.” Which is, of course, the best way to end such a dalliance. We stan proper closure.

Photo credit: Getty Images More

Currently, Mel, 44, follows James, 31, on Instagram but he doesn't follow her back. She's probably too busy with the new Spice Girls movie (which is believed to be released next year) to be bothered anyway.

To conclude: name a more iconic duo... we'll wait.

Cosmopolitan UK have reached out to James Arthur and Mel B about the report.
